translations: 大块，大片；厚块；（俚语）强壮

sentences.sentence: My favourite part of the book is when Tom and Hunk start their adventures on the island in the Mississippi River.
sentences.translation: 这本书中我最喜欢的部分是汤姆和哈克在密西西比河的小岛上开始他们的冒险之旅。

sentences.sentence: This enormous hunk of steel will soon be at the centre of a gas turbine big enough to meet the electricity needs of a small city.
sentences.translation: 这个巨大钢件在不久之后将被置于一个大型燃汽涡轮机的中心，该涡轮机发电量足可以满足一个小城市的需要。
